_comment: languages: keys are BCP-47 codes like 'ru-RU', 'en-US'.
Each language block may contain: creator, credit, description, rights, terms, source.
creator: string or array of strings (author names), written to XMP-dc:Creator as a list.
Other fields: string or array of strings (multi-line text).
Exactly one language SHOULD have 'default': true – it is used as the default/x-default language.

creator: Name Surname
Co-author
description: Short description of this archive (in English).
